designation: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Intern
name: VISHAL AGARWAL

projects.name: BlogiDo App
projects.description: Developed and deployed a Robust Backend System using Node.js and Express.js to handle blog creation requests, file uploads, and database interactions. Designed and implemented RESTful API endpoints for user registration, login, and protected routes.

projects.name: Attendance System
projects.description: Contributed with a team of 2 developers, achieving 40% improvement in attendance tracking processes. Conducting performance testing and optimization, ensuring 99% system reliability and scalability.

projects.name: Real Time Weather Application
projects.description: Integrated the OpenWeather API to fetch current weather data based on user input. Designed a user-friendly interface allowing users to input city names and view corresponding weather details.

experiences.role_name: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Intern
experiences.description: Immersed myself in a stimulating learning environment at YBI Foundation, where I gained hands-on experience in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Developed a solid understanding of Machine Learning techniques, including supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.
